summary: A British diplomat is arrested on charges of working with Russian mafia. After death threats to his wife, they are taken into protective custody. Then the MI6 shows up with a new piece of the puzzle.
cast: Dougray Scott|Rachael Blake|Jeremy Lindsay Taylor|Richard Roxburgh|Claire Forlani|Don Hany|Elan Zavelsky|Jonny Pasvolsky|Tony Martin|Socratis Otto|Stephen Curry|Alex Menglet|Shane Briant|Costa Ronin|Alin Sumarwata|Chris Haywood|Doris Younane|Kate Box|Anita Hegh|Janeth Mayo|Jason Polkinghorne|Lusiana Belle Frost|Tharini Mudaliar|Tony Barry|Pacharo Mzembe|Maria Matteo|Fergus Whelan|Hugo Whelan|Lindsay Moss|Jason Glover|David Kerslake|Helen Sutermeister|Gerard Webb|Andrew Hunter|Jodine Muir|Leon Burchill|Ilya Melnikoff|Yiani Andrikidis|Jacqui Osborne|Darryl Cooper|Christian Antidormi|David Baltins|Mark Duncan|Philip Partridge|Igor Breakenback|Neal Horton|Ashley Fairfield|Nigel Harbach|Normie Daghel|Aaron Hammond|Bob Mirovic|Christian Clark|Mike Duncan|Val Athanassiou|Leonidas Gulaptis
title: El diplomático
